languages.text: Сервиторы-Блаженные перенесли древние знания, хранившиеся в их умах, в реальность, усовершенствовав {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щиты{/g} пустотного корабля.
The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.
languages.original_text: Сервиторы-Блаженные перенесли древние знания, хранившиеся в их умах, в реальность, усовершенствовав {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щиты{/g} пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by improving one of the voidship's components.
The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by improving one of the voidship's components.
The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of one of the voidship's components.
The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of one of the voidship's components.
The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

languages.text: Les Illuminés servitorisés ont donné forme aux connaissances anciennes stockées dans leurs esprits en améliorant les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les Illuminés servitorisés ont donné forme aux connaissances anciennes stockées dans leurs esprits en améliorant un des composants du vaisseau.

languages.text: サーヴィター化された触れられし者たちは、ヴォイドシップの{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}を改良することで、彼らの頭脳に蓄積された古代の知識を形にした。
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィター化された触れられし者たちは、ヴォイドシップの部品のひとつを改良することで、彼らの頭脳に蓄積された古代の知識を形にした。
サーヴィター化された触れられし者たちは、ヴォイドシップのシールドを改良することで、彼らの頭脳に蓄積された古代の知識を形にした。

languages.text: 在成为机仆之后，受召者将虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}进行了改造，为储存在他们脑海中的远古知识赋予新的形态。
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在成为机仆之后，受召者将虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}进行了改造，为储存在他们脑海中的远古知识赋予新的形态。

languages.text: Los Tocados dieron forma a los antiguos conocimientos almacenados en sus mentes mediante la mejora de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} de la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los Tocados dieron forma a los antiguos conocimientos almacenados en sus mentes mediante la mejora de uno de los componentes de la nave del vacío.

languages.text: Die servitorisierten Berührten haben dem alten Wissen in ihrem Kopf Gestalt verliehen – durch die Verbesserung der {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des Raumschiffs.
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die servitorisierten Berührten haben dem alten Wissen in ihrem Kopf Gestalt verliehen — durch die Verbesserung eines Bauteils des Raumschiffs.

languages.text: Hizmetörleştirilmiş Mütehassisler, zihinlerinde depoladıkları kadim bilgiye uçsuz gemisinin {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanlarını{/g} geliştirmek suretiyle şekil verdiler.
languages.original_text: The servitorised Touched gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds through the improvement of the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.
